text: Caryodendron angustifolium is a species of plant in the family Euphorbiaceae. It is native to Costa Rica, Panama, and Colombia.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesMitré, M. 1998. Caryodendron angustifolium. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007.Idárraga- Piedrahita, A., Ortiz, R.D.C., Callejas Posada, R. & Merello, M. (eds.) (2011). Flora de Antioquia: Catálogo de las Plantas Vasculares 2: 1-939. Universidad de Antioquia, Medellín. ==References== Category:Acalyphoideae Category:Flora of Panama Category:Flora of Costa Rica Category:Flora of Colombia Category:Data deficient plants Category:Plants described in 1929 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Caryodendron angustifolium
